Delete concept to an input
Parameters:
Name Type Description
concepts Array.<object> Object with keys explained below:
Properties
Name Type Description
concept object
Properties
Name Type Description
id string The concept id (required)
value boolean Whether or not the input is a positive (true) or negative (false) example of the concept (default: true)
